statements: SELECT * FROM customer_churn_prediction;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE churn_prediction_result = TRUE;
SELECT product_purchased, transaction_amount FROM customer_churn_prediction ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, churn_prediction_result FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE churn_prediction_result = FALSE;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE product_purchased = 'iPhone' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, product_purchased, churn_prediction_result FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY churn_prediction_result ASC, transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND churn_prediction_result = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_purchased, COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_churn_prediction GROUP BY product_purchased ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE churn_prediction_result = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND phone_number LIKE '555%'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT customers.name, transactions.transaction_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, churn_probability, prediction_result FROM churn_prediction WHERE churn_probability > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, prediction_date FROM churn_prediction WHERE prediction_result = 'churned' ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, market_segment FROM transactions WHERE market_segment = 'retail' AND transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(transaction_amount) > 5000 ORDER BY SUM(transaction_amount) DESC;

SELECT customer_id, AVG(churn_probability) AS avg_churn_prob FROM churn_prediction WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(churn_probability) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_churn_prob DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY activity_duration DESC, activity_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS num_activities FROM customer_activity GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(activity_id) < 3 ORDER BY num_activities ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, churn_probability FROM churn_predictions WHERE churn_probability > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM churn_history WHERE churn_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT c.name, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 100 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT c.name, ch.churned, ch.churn_date FROM customers c LEFT JOIN churn_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id WHERE ch.churned = TRUE ORDER BY ch.churn_date DESC;

SELECT c.name, cp.churn_probability, cp.prediction_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN churn_predictions cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cp.churn_probability > 0.8 ORDER BY cp.prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM churn_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, training_run_id, log_message FROM model_logs WHERE model_name = 'Model A';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5 ORDER BY AVG(transaction_amount) DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, churn_predictions.churn_probability FROM customers JOIN churn_predictions ON customers.customer_id = churn_predictions.customer_id WHERE churn_predictions.prediction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM churn_history WHERE churn_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01');
SELECT customer_id, model_name, log_message FROM model_logs WHERE model_name = 'Regression Model' AND training_run_id LIKE 'run_%' ORDER BY log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
